summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6659 for the improvement of Sand Point Way Northwest from Northeast 50th Street to 45th Avenue Northeast; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing underground utilities lines and a residential street lighting system, under Ordinance No. 104760, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of Land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
